definitions.definition: A sailing ship with two or more masts , all with fore-and-aft sails ; if two masted, having a foremast and a mainmast .
A glass for drinking a large measure of sherry .
A glass of beer , of a size which varies between states ( Wikipedia ).
A large goblet or drinking glass, used for lager or ale ( Wikipedia ).
A covered wagon used by emigrants .

main_definition: ( nautical ) A sailing ship with two or more masts , all with fore-and-aft sails ; if two masted, having a foremast and a mainmast .
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) A glass for drinking a large measure of sherry .
( Australia ) A glass of beer , of a size which varies between states ( Wikipedia ).
( US ) A large goblet or drinking glass, used for lager or ale ( Wikipedia ).
( historical ) A covered wagon used by emigrants .
